metadata.description: Lullaby is a strong-willed, 2nd generation covert assassin, trained from a very young age by her father, Z.  Typically, she adopts a new look and identity for each mission.  And upon receiving orders to "terminate," Lullaby does so with clever -- and sadistic -- precision.  But, Lullaby's black and white world is about to turn gray.  And that means the streets could soon run red.
metadata.name: Sweet Lullaby
